# How to change DNS settings on iOS

  1. Go to Settings and open Wi-Fi

  1. Press i button on right of your connected Wi-Fi

  1. Scroll down and find Configure DNS, press it

  1. Select Manual, remove old DNS servers and then add DNS.SB's servers
185.222.222.222
45.11.45.11
2a09::
2a11::

  1. Press Save
